fulltext:
CV_TUAN LE 
SUMMARY Over 21-years experience IT leader with a demonstrated history of working in 
banking / financial services industry, practically in business and technology setup, operation, 
innovation, and transformation. Passionate in FinTech, Digital Transformation, Ecosystem and 
Platform Development.  Skilled in IT Strategy, IT Management, IT Governance, Enterprise 
Architecture, ITIL, IT Service Management, and Project Management. Strong professional with 
a Bachelor of Engineering focused in Electronics and Telecommunications from Ho Chi Minh 
University of Technology (Dai Hoc Bach Khoa Tp. HCM).  
SKILLS  
• IT Governance  
• IT Management  
• IT Strategy  
• IT Operations  
• IT Service Management/ITIL  
• Information Security  
• Disaster Recovery  
• Vendor Management  
• Project Management  
• Business Continuity Plan  
• Relationship Mgmt  
• Enterprise Architecture  
• System Architecture  
• Business Analysis  
• Software Development Life Cycle  
• Agile / DevOps  
• Change Management  
• Data Governance  
• Data Warehouse  
• Business Intelligence  
• Data Visualization  
• Product Design  
• Banking  
• Financial Services  
• Loans  
• Credit  
• Business Transformation  
• Digital Transformation  
• Business Process Reengineering & Improvement  
• Organizational Design / Development  
• Strategic Mangement  
TECHNOLOGIES  
Enterprise Resource Planning, Supply Chain Management, Core Banking systems Core Finance 
systems (Loan Origination, Loan Management and Loan Collection…) Policy Administration 
System, Customer Relationship Management,  Payment systems (online/offline), Payment 
Gateways, Payment Switching, Accounting System, Content Management System, Document 
Management System, System, Email, Network, Voice, Virtualization, Web, Telephony, Storage,  
Cloud, Integration, Hyper-converged, Data Center, Server, Routing,  AD, DNS, DHCP, DFS, 
LAN/WAN, Windows, Linux, Microsoft Office 365, Google G-Suite,  Oracle, Ms SQL, 
MySQL, MongoDB, InfluxDB, .NET, VB, C, PHP, XML, HTML, Java, JS, Python, Ruby, Go, 
Clojure, SOA, Microservices, Websphere, JBoss, Kubernetes, Kong, Agile, LEAN / Kaizen, 
PMBOK  
EXPERIENCE  
GO-PAY (VIETNAM)                                                                                           2019 – Present  
Go-Pay is the payments platform of Go-Jek – Indonesia’s first decacorn and largest ondemand 
service platform. The startup with US$10 billion valuation now operates in Indonesia,  
Vietnam, Singapore, Thailand and will soon operate in the Philippines and Malaysia. Together 
with Go-Jek transportation platform, Go-Pay, the payments platform, will be using technology as 
a mean of social impact, aimed in uplifting daily life of people in the market it operates with 
convenient services for all need (transportation, delivery, shopping, payment, etc.) and 
improving the economic growth by creating jobs, improving livelihoods of multiple people and 
helping nudge micro-entrepreneurs. Go-Pay strategy involves all possible areas of digital 
financial products and services, from online acceptance, to offline acceptance, and also 
investment and lending products.  
Head of Information Technology (Director)                                             (Feb. 2019 – Present)  
 One of the very first members of Vietnam company setup team, reports to Go-Pay’s Head of 
International Expansion, working not only in technology side such as technology/product 
platform’s implementation, but also in business side such as setting the objectives and strategies 
for Go-Pay Vietnam business.  
 Co-leading/Supporting Go-Viet’s IT and Technology Team in strengthen its operations and 
developments, especially in term of Governance, Risk and Compliance.  
 Working with all Go-Jek’s business divisions, subsidiaries, and business partners to support 
business growth.  
CIMB BANK VIETNAM                                                                                            2017 – 2019  
CIMB Group is a leading KL-headquartered ASEAN universal bank, one of the largest 
investment banks in Asia and one of the largest Islamic banks in the world. It’s the second 
largest bank in Malaysia.  
Vice President, Information Technology, Technology & Operations (Nov. 2017 – Jan. 2019) 
– Head of Information Technology.  
 The key purposes of the role are to support business requirements and manage Technology 
teams, including all of IT relevant daily works of banking application and infrastructure support, 
develop/explore IT strategic solutions to ensure business get a cutting-edge technology platform, 
advance competitiveness. Manage and drive the delivery of critical projects to transform 
Technology Services to serve business.  
 Works with regional teams and responsibles for integration and development for new digital 
banking platform to the traditional banking platform.  
 Strategy and Planning: Lead teams to formulate IT policies to support various business units. 
Ensure effective utilisation of manpower and responsible for monitoring operating cost 
effectiveness of IT departments. Manage annual budget assigned to IT. Develop strategies to 
track and analyse business activities to anticipate future needs and propose recommendations. 
Implement regional business/IT strategies.  
 Risk Management / Regulatory Compliance: Full understanding of and compliance with own 
area’s internal policy and procedural requirements as well as regulatory / statutory requirements 
from State Bank and other statutory / regulatory bodies. Follow regional standard/guidelines of 
project management as well as meet auditing requirements. Ensure all issues / incidents are 
reported in timely manner and have properly follow up till it has been solved. Ensure sufficient 
back up/DR/BCP capabilities to support business and future growth.  
 People Management / Team Work: Actively assist other team members to fulfil departments 
work within the set time frame. Assist top/senior management on the management of IT teams 
and/or escalate for further guidance. Develop, build and lead an effective and cohesively unit. 
Exchange and share “best practice” / lesson learnt from experienced problems to other team 
members.  
 Control and Monitoring: Monitor Information Security. Monitor Technology cost (total and 
unit cost basis), IT purchases within approved budget. Monitor vendor’s performance and SLA. 
Monitor regional IT supports and SLA. Control IT system administration such as creating User 
ID, authority set up, setting up new products, SIT, UAT and PRD.  
 Reporting: Provide regular and ad-hoc reports for management regarding project progress, 
system management statistics and matters related to IT departments. Prepare IT regulatory 
reports as per requirement.  
 Business As Usual (BAU): Manage Technology teams to support business requirements. 
Manage the process of developments and changes. Work cohesively with Regional IT teams to 
get the relevant support. In charge of hardware, software and IT infrastructure/network matters 
for the entire bank, including PAR preparation. Liaise with IT application and system vendors 
and other relevant services providers. IT/Business knowledge transfer from the application 
solution providers, prepare knowledge base and relevant materials to manage the application, 
work with BA teams to rollout application enhancement, changes or support.  
TOYOTA FINANCIAL SERVICES VIETNAM                                                    2008 – 2017  
Member of Toyota Financial Services Group - Toyota Group’s financial services arm, is the first 
captive finance company in Vietnam, to “Provide sound financial services that contribute to the 
prosperous life for Toyota customers and others.”  
Senior Manager – Corporate Planning & Management Support (Apr. 2017 – Nov. 2017) - 
IT & Technology. 
  Working with the CEO, in line with Toyota Group and Toyota Financial Services Group 
Mission, Vision and Strategic Directions to pursue Sustainable Growth, lead the enterprise wide 
Digital Transformation by setting direction, strategy, roadmap and execution plan to innovate 
business.  
 Working with all Business Stakeholders to create ideas, develop roadmap, initiate relevant 
project execution to adopt and develop advanced technologies and solutions to improve business 
operation.  
 Being the Product Owner for technology/digital solutions that responsibles for the whole 
product life cycle.  
 Priority projects:  
- Auto approval in Credit Application Processing (with auto CIC data collection).  
- Optimize the front-end business operation from Sales & Credit areas to Loan disbursement area 
- Improve the customer contact and communication by developing Contact Centre.  
- Develop client portals (individual/corporate) to improve Customer Services operation.  
- Develop the Data Warehouse / Business Intelligence framework/solution to enable and improve 
business analysis and decision making.  
- Transform IT to provide flexible and agile IT infrastructure, support and services to support 
business growth.  
- DC / Office relocation / expansion. 
Senior Manager – IT (Jan. 2009 – Apr. 2017) – Head of IT  
BCP Manager (acting – 2010 – 2013)  
IT Manager (Mar. 2008 – Dec. 2008) – Head of IT  
 Member of Management Committee, Head of IT, reports directly to CEO, responsible for all 
IT functions across the organization including: operations and developments of infrastructure, 
applications (including business applications) and IT services.  
 Lead IT strategic and operational planning to achieve business goals. Be a part of corporate 
Mid-Term Planning activities. Develop IT Mid-Term Plan in accordance with Toyota Financial 
Services Corporation’s process following Toyota global process.  
 Coordinate with regional IT teams from global head-quarter in Japan to align local IT 
strategies and operations in accordance with global IT strategies, directions & vision of Toyota 
Financial Services / Toyota group. Coordinate with global and regional IT teams in global IT 
projects.  
 Fostering innovation, prioritizing IT initiatives, and coordinating the evaluation, deployment, 
and management of current and future IT systems.  
 Build up and manage software development teams (combined of internal and outsourced 
resources) to completely build and deliver a replacement core financial system (named SIS). The 
new system is up and running to cover all business areas, from front office to back office, from 
Loan Origination, Loan Management to Loan Collection, from retail business to wholesale 
business. The system development is based on modern technology platforms/architectures such 
as .NET, Oracle, SOA, web based and workflow management; It’s backed with Agile 
development methodology to speed up system delivery.  
 Develop the IT organization structure to support the needs of business. Recruit, manage, 
develop, and retain IT staff & resource for operations and projects.  
 Ensure smoothly operation of all IT areas: infrastructure, applications, and services.  
 Ensure corporate information security, ensure system disaster recovery capability.  
 Continuously develop the ICT infrastructure to support business expansion.  
 Continuously develop the applications (including business applications: core financial system, 
accounting systems and other operational systems) to support business development.  
 Setup and manage IT vendor relationship to assure best external services.  
 Develop and manage IT and IT related policies and procedures to assure the standard and 
compliance.   
 Responsible for all IT and Business Solutions projects.  
 Support in development of business users’ knowledge and skills (especially in business 
processes with core system, IT and information security knowledge).  
 In charge of BCP (Business Continuity Planning) function in designing, developing, 
deploying, and managing the BCP operations, including: development of BCP framework 
(policies & procedures), conduct BCP trainings, conduct BCP testing and review.  
 Member of company setup team. Established company IT systems and operations from the 
very first days of business commencement including: infrastructure, core financial system and 
accounting system implementation; IT services setup…  
 A leader of BPR (Business Process Reengineering) projects to review the core business 
(credit) operation processes and develop solutions aim to have improvement of business 
operation efficiency and effectiveness.  
ILA VIETNAM                                                                                                          2002 – 2008  
Foreign-owned education and training company in Vietnam, offering a broad range of 
educational programmes and services.  
Operations Department (Apr. 2006 – Feb. 2008) - Operations System Executive  
 Control the business working system in the following areas: the compatibility / integration of 
the system and business processes, the effectiveness and efficiency of the system, the 
development of business applications, and the document control system.  
 Build, deploy, implement, and develop the business working system.  
 Corporate planning and reporting management in the following processes: communicate of 
corporate planning process, communicate of reporting process.  
 Internal auditing activities for internal control and business operations: conducting internal 
audit activities.  
MIS Department (Aug. 2002 – Apr. 2006) - Webmaster, Network & System Admin, IT 
Support Engineer.   
 Be responsible for all IT issues supporting, designing, implementing, managing, and 
administrating all computer networks / servers / IT systems / intranet / website in HO and all 
branches.   
 Define requirements, design, plan, implement, and manage all company's servers and network 
equipment.  
 Research, plan, implement and manage the company antivirus system (based on Symantec 
products), servers monitoring system, and inventory system.  
 Well-versed in the design of networking systems. Supply backup and documentation of 
computer and networking systems.  
 Propel new technologies, formulate the future visions.  
 Facilitate hardware repair and maintenance through LAN and WAN administration support, 
of all company Windows, Macintosh workstations, as well as end-user workstations.  
 Troubleshooting daily difficulties, tasks, requests, providing support both on-site and 
telephones/emails.  
 Monitor IT spare parts/store/assets.  
 Set goals, managing daily, weekly, and annual scheduling for IT Support team.  
 Contact and negotiate to ensure best price and service available from suppliers and providers; 
presiding over from initial contract negotiation to final implementation, and on-going operations. 
  Maintain and update system when new staff joins or leaves the company.  
 Maintain excellent relationship with peers, internal customers, and suppliers.   
V.A.M (VINH NAM) CO., LTD                                                                                 1996 – 2008  
IT Consultant, Network Administrator (part time - Dec. 1996 – Feb. 2008)   
 Define requirements, design, plan, implement, manage and develop company's information 
systems including: - Research, document, propel new technologies, and formulate the future 
visions. - Set goals and manage network and system annual plan for IT team. - Conduct business 
process review, and recommend IT-relevant workplace and system improvements to Board of 
Directors. - Collaborate with IT officers/IT programmers/IT suppliers/IT providers to determine 
current and future needs, propose IT ideas to improve workflow. - Manage the implementation of 
various software/hardware projects. - Advise and aid IT officers/IT programmers on difficulty 
issues and problems.  
 ONLINE COMMUNITIES                                                                                      2004 – 2009  
FreeCodeVN is the biggest online community in software / website development and 
management at that time.  Other online communities in software development and management.  
Administrator (Jan. 2004 – Jan. 2009)  
- Manages all aspects of community operations  
- Leads the community developments  
 EDUCATION & COURSES EDUCATION  
 Master of Business Administration, General, August 2018 - 2019, Columbia Southern 
University  
 Bachelor of Engineering in Electrical – Electronics, Major of Electronics - 
Telecommunications, September 1996 - December 2001, Ho Chi Minh City University of 
Technology (Đại học Bách Khoa)  
COURSES  
 Toyota Financial Services Management Development Program, October 2012, Toyota 
Financial Services Corporation, Nagoya, Japan   
 Effective Communication, March 2013, Dale Carnegie Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh City  
 Toyota’s Kaizen, Toyota Way, Toyota Financial Services Way, Toyota Business Practice, 
Toyota Financial Services Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh City and Online University of Toyota  
 I-Speak Your Language – Communication Skills, September 2007, ILA Vietnam  
 The ISO 9001:2000 Internal Auditor Training, July 2007, SGS Vietnam  
 ISO 9000 Awareness & Interpreting, May 2007, SGS Vietnam  
 Communication Skills, August 2005, ILA Vietnam  
 Certified Ethical Hacker, April 2005 - June 2005, Athena Vietnam  
 Team Building Skills, May 2005, ILA Vietnam  
 Time Management Course, February 2004, ILA Vietnam  
 Project Management for all Disciplines, June 2003, ILA Vietnam  
 Creative Problem Solving, April 2003, ILA Vietnam   
 Turbo Pascal Programming Language, December 1991 - January 1993, Maika Informatic 
Club - Scitec Joint Stock Information Company  
AWARDS 
  Long service (5-year) Award in Toyota Financial Services Vietnam, 2013  
 Long service (5-year) Award in ILA Vietnam, 2007  
 The first prize in HCMC University of Technology Student Information Olympic contest, 
02/1998   
 The first prize in Ho Chi Minh City Youth Information Contest, 11/1995   
 The first prize in Ho Chi Minh City Non-Professional Youth Information Contest, 07/1995   
 The encouraging prize in Ho Chi Minh City Youth Information Contest, 12/1994  
PERSONAL INTERESTS 
Open Source Software, Cloud Computing, Big Data, Data Science, FinTech IoT, Automobile, 
Motorbike, Lifestyle, Movie, Smart home Startup, Innovation, Blockchain
